dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1761 IS: To take certain Federal land located in Lassen County, California, into trust for the benefit of the Susanville Indian Rancheria, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Boxer (for herself and Mrs. Feinstein) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs

form.official-title: To take certain Federal land located in Lassen County, California, into trust for the benefit of the Susanville Indian Rancheria, and for other purposes.

section.header: Land into trust for the Susanville Indian Rancheria

subsection.text: The land described in subsection (b) is taken into trust for the benefit of the Susanville Indian Rancheria, subject to valid existing rights.

The land taken into trust under subsection (a) is the approximately 301 acres of Federal land under the administrative jurisdiction of the Bureau of Land Management identified as Conveyance Boundary on the map titled Susanville Indian Rancheria Land Conveyance and dated December 31, 2014.
Class II gaming and class III gaming under the Indian Gaming Regulatory Act (25 U.S.C. 2701 et seq.) shall not be allowed at any time on the land taken into trust under subsection (a).
